column1: Smoque BBQ////Can be challenging.  There's a lot behind the place that has restrictions on when it can be used for Smoque patrons
column2: and it is real precarious.  There's metered street parking available
column3: but if you search a bit
column4: you'll find free street parking as well.  Other than Smoque
column5: there's not much worthwhile in this area.
